name: Blackened Fish
description: Keep your body healthy and strong – this great low-sodium recipe packs a powerful punch of protein with 36 g per serving!

ingredients.name: fish fillets, such as sole, tilapia or other white fish

preparation: Place sriracha seasoning, Fish Rub and Tuxedo Pepper Blend into a plastic bag. Add one fillet at a time and shake well to fully cover.

Using a basting brush, brush frying pan with oil and set over medium-high heat. Add fillets and cook for about 6–8 minutes, until a dark crust forms on each side. Reduce heat to medium to prevent burning, if necessary.
Place on plates, squeeze lemons overtop and sprinkle with Sea Salt.
